verses.verse: "Put the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> to your <S%H2441>lips!<s%> Something like an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> is over <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> because they have <S%H5674>broken<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H6586>rebelled<s%> against my <S%H8451>law.<s%>
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> has cast <S%H2186>off<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good.<s%> The <S%H341>enemy<s%> will pursue <S%H7291>him.<s%>

They have set up <S%H4427>kings,<s%> but not by <S%H7786>me.<s%> They have made princes, and I <S%H3045>didn't<s%> approve. Of their <S%H3701>silver<s%> and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> they have <S%H6213>made<s%> themselves <S%H6091>idols,<s%> that they may be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>

Let <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> <S%H2186>throw<s%> out his <S%H5695>calf<s%> <S%H639>idol!<s%> My anger <S%H2734>burns<s%> against <S%H3808>them!<s%> How long will it be until they are <S%H3201>capable<s%> of <S%H5356>purity?<s%>

For this is even from <S%H3478>Israel!<s%> The <S%H2796>workman<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H430>it,<s%> and it is no God; <S%H5695>indeed,<s%> the calf of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> shall be broken in <S%H7616>pieces.<s%>

For they <S%H2232>sow<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and they will <S%H7114>reap<s%> the <S%H5492>whirlwind.<s%> He has no <S%H7054>standing<s%> <S%H6780>grain.<s%> The stalk will <S%H6213>yield<s%> no <S%H7058>head.<s%> <S%H194>If<s%> it does <S%H6213>yield,<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> will swallow it <S%H1104>up.<s%>
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> is swallowed <S%H1104>up.<s%> Now they are among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> like a <S%H2656>worthless<s%> <S%H3627>thing.<s%>
For they have gone <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> like a wild <S%H6501>donkey<s%> wandering <S%H909>alone.<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> has <S%H8566>hired<s%> lovers for <S%H158>himself.<s%>

But although they <S%H8566>sold<s%> themselves among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> I will now <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H4592>them;<s%> and they begin to <S%H2490>waste<s%> away because of the <S%H4853>oppression<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of mighty <S%H8269>ones.<s%>
Because <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> has <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> for <S%H2398>sinning,<s%> they became for him <S%H4196>altars<s%> for <S%H2398>sinning.<s%>
I <S%H3789>wrote<s%> for him the many <S%H7230>things<s%> of my <S%H8451>law;<s%> but they were <S%H2803>regarded<s%> as a strange <S%H2114>thing.<s%>

As for the <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> of my <S%H1890>offerings,<s%> they <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3068>it;<s%> But Yahweh <S%H7521>doesn't<s%> accept <S%H2142>them.<s%> Now he will remember their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H6485>punish<s%> their <S%H2403>sins.<s%> They will <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

For <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> his <S%H6213>Maker<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1964>palaces;<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> has <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities;<s%> but I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on his <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and it will <S%H398>devour<s%> its <S%H759>fortresses.<s%>"
